title: User update the mlb login email to a new email
Verify a new PV account being created when user accepts a manual forwards via email link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Sender sends a forward invites to an email
AND
Email is having MLB login
AND
Email is not having the PV account
custom_steps:
WHEN
User accepts the forwards via email link
custom_expected:
THEN
Ticketing being accepted
AND
A new PV account being created
AND
Account link in Firestore shows as  forward-Linked type forwardCreateEmail
AND
Once user refresh in BP Linked type loginRefresh for all other QA accounts- In prod this might be spring venue account if enabled

title: Verify a new PV account being created when user accepts a manual forwards by verifying email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Sender sends a forward invites to an email
AND
Email is having MLB login
AND
Email is not having the PV account
custom_expected:
THEN
Ticket being accepted
AND
A new PV account being created
AND
Account link in Firestore shows as  forward-Linked type forwardCreateEmail
AND
Once user refresh in BP Linked type luserRequestManualRefresh for all other QA accounts- In prod this might be spring venue account if enabled
